document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus plasoni species group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus plasoni species group (Coleoptera: Buprestidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Agrilus plasoni
Obenberger, 1917 : 212
­213
. Holotype by monotypy ♂, NMPC : “Constantinopel [sic!] [confusion of locality, see remarks], c[ollection]. Plason [p] \ Typus [p] [red label with black border] \ Agrilus Plasoni m. [h] Det. Dr. Obenberger [p] \ Mus. Nat. Pragae [p] 26479 [h] Inv. [p] [orange label]”.

Agrilus Jeanvoinei
Descarpentries & Villiers, 1963 : 52
, 54­ 55 , Figs. 20, 25. syn. nov. Holotype ♀, MNHN : “ TONKIN [p] Than Moo [sic!] [= Thanh Moï, Lang Son province,
21 ° 38 'N
,
106 ° 33 'E
] II. IV. [h] 191 [p] 8 [h] JEANVOINE [leg.] [p] \ A. jeanvoinei n. sp. Holotype nobis A. Descarpentries et [h] A. Villiers det. 195 [p] [number 5 is overwritten to 6 ] 2 [h] \ MUS 2 UM PARIS 1935 COLL . A. THÉRY [p]”.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks . The type locality of
A. plasoni
was confused in the description and corrected by Obenberger (1940 , 1958 ) as follows: China , Fokien [= Fujian Sheng province,
26 °00'N
,
118 °00'E
] ( China bor. [sic!] occ.).

The description of
A . jeanvoinei
was based except of the holotype on inexplicit number of paratypes from: “Hoa­Binh (R. P. de Cooman [leg.])”; “ Bhoutan : Maria­Basti [recently probably in India , Northern part of West Bengal province] (L. Durel [leg.])” and “ Chine : Kouy­Tschéou [= Guizhou Sheng (province),
27 °00'N
,
107 °00'E
]. I found in MNHN only 3 paratypes from Vietnam (for precise locality data, see Material examined below). Locality data from “ Bhoutan ” is preliminarily excluded from distribution as it could pertain also to very closely related
A. darjiling
sp. nov.

CHINA
: Shaanxi : 1 ♂, EJCB : “ CHINA , 1000 ­ 1300 m , Shaanxi, Qinling mts., XUNYANGBA ( 6 km E) [
33 ° 33 'N
,
108 ° 37 'E
],
23 . v. ­ 13 . vi. 1998
, I. H. Marshal leg.”. Zheijang : China : Fokien [sic!], Tien­mu­shan [= Tianmu Shan, Zhejiang province,
30 ° 31 'N
,
119 ° 36 'E
] (
Obenberger 1940
). Guizhou : 1 ♂, EJCB : “CH­Guizhou NE,
27 . V. ­ 3 . VI.
, 20 km NW of Jiangkou, 1995 , FANJING SHAN , Kuaichang [
27 ° 51 'N
,

], E. Jendek & O. Šauša leg.”. Hunan : 1 ♂, 1 ♀, EJCB : “ China Hunan prov., Zhang Jia Jie [National Park, nearby Dayong, NW Hunan, approximate coordinates

,
110 ° 28 'E
, C. Holzschuh pers. com.],
VI. 1993
, C. Holzschuh leg.”; 1 ♂, EJCB : “ CHINA , Hunan S, 1994 , CHENZHOU env.,
19 ­ 21 . VI.
,
25.49 N
112.59 E
, E. Jendek & O. Šauša leg.”. Jiangxi : 1 ♂, EJCB : “ CHINA Jiangxi W, JINGGANG SHAN , Ciping [
26 ° 34 'N
,
114 °09'E
],
2 ­ 14 . VI. 1994
, E. Jendek & O. Šauša leg.”. Fujian : Fukien (Kwangtseh) [= Hangchuan,
27 ° 30 'N
,
117 ° 24 'E
]
29 . VII. 1937
, Klapperich [leg.] (
Obenberger 1940
); 3 exs, NMPC : “Kuatun [
27 ° 40 'N
,
117 ° 40 'E
], Fukien, China ,
1 . VI.
,
24 . VI.
,
25 . VI. 1946
(Tschung Sen)”; 1 ex, NMPC : “Kuatun ( 2300 m ) 27,40n [ordlich]. Br[eite]. 117,40ö[stlich]. L[änge]. J. Klapperich [leg.]
22. 6 . 1938
(Fukien)”; 1 ex, EJCB : “ China , Fujian prov., Shaowu [
27 ° 20 'N
,
117 ° 29 'E
],
13 ­ 16. 6 . 1991
”. Yunnan : Lunling [= Longshan,
24 ° 35 'N
,
98 ° 41 'E
], 1000 m ,
15 . V. 1955
. ­ Bušcik et U Lo lgt. (

).
